title: From 'Shaft' To Von Trapp, The Musicians We Lost in 2014
teaser: NPR's Arun Rath presents the work of a few musicians who died in 2014 but didn't get enough recognition, including a rockabilly forefather, an Indian mandolin player and a leading Texas bluesman.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
